com.swinburne.irtsa.irtsa.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swinburne.irtsa.irtsa.server.Server

  • public final class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The Server class is a singleton that initiates and manages a persistent connection to the micro-controller. The actual connection logic is contained within the Connection class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MessageObservable messages
      A message observable constructed from the string observable contained on the connection instance.
      static <any> status
      Observable of the status of the connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void connect()
      Starts the persistent connection to the microcontroller.
      static Status getStatus()
      Utility function for getting the current status in case you don't want to use the status observable.
      static <T extends Message>
      void      		 send(T message)
      Tells the connection to send a Message instance to the server.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Server()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static void connect()
        Starts the persistent connection to the microcontroller. You should only need to call this once when your app starts.

      • send

        public static <T extends Message> void send(T message)
        Tells the connection to send a Message instance to the server.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of message.
        Parameters:
        message - Message instance to send to the server.

      • getStatus

        public static Status getStatus()
        Utility function for getting the current status in case you don't want to use the status observable.
        Returns:
        The current status
